name: PHASEMixerParameters
desc: An object that specifies a mixer for sound events and orients them in 3D space.

items.name: func addAmbientMixerParameters(identifier: String, listener: PHASEListener)
items.desc: Adds runtime parameters for an ambient mixer.

items.name: func addSpatialMixerParameters(identifier: String, source: PHASESource, listener: PHASEListener)
items.desc: Adds runtime parameters for a spatial mixer.
